Social Media Surrogate

About

Social Media Surrogate is a piece of software which analyzes your online social media accounts (ie., Facebook, Twitter) in order to accurately emulate the dialogue and behaviors of your online personas.

Once installed and configured, the Social Media Surrogate autonomously creates new and manages existing online relationships by engaging in online interactions with your social circle through timely and relevant text and image updates. Responses and comments are algorithmically modeled after those previously made under your account.

Install

System requirements:

  1. A computer
  2. An internet connection
  3. A Facebook and/or Twitter account
  4. A text analysis program which can accurately reproduce a unique "voice" given a limited set status updates, and messages.

Download

Help

My system doesn't meet the minimum system requirements

Many people get the error message "Sorry, but your system doesn't meet the minimum system requirements (see item #4.) Please upgrade your system and try again." If you get this message, make sure you have installed the appropriate text analysis software.

My Social Media Surrogate does not accurately represent me

The Social Media Surrogate not is designed to accurately represent your physical self and personality. It is a computer algorithm which analyzes and emulates your online personas. Any differences are not errors in the algorithm, but differences between self-perception and online self-representation.

Social Media Surrogate has changed my social interactions

This should only happen after you have successfully installed the Social Media Surrogate software. If this has occured prior to the software's installation, please contact your most readily accessible friend.

My friend installed Social Media Surrogate and has since passed on

Please contact the appropriate social network in order to rectify the situation.
